    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    activateButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    At the beginning, button is disabled, because user must choose a couple of students When choice boxes contain a value, button is activated
    void
    confirm1()
    When user confirms first 2 students to exchange The first couple of choice boxes is disabled, and second one is populated
    void
    confirm2()
    When user confirms second 2 students to exchange The second couple of choice boxes is disabled, and third one is populated
    void
    confirm3()
    When user confirms last 2 students to exchange A message is sent to server, which contains character card 7 parameters
    void

    setting entrance choice box, adding all available students on entrance
    <T> void
    setupScene(ClientModel clientModel, T parameters)
    This method prepares the form to ask character card 7 parameters Choice boxes are populated with available colors and islands This card allows user to exchange up to 3 students between entrance and character card, so at the beginning is only populated the first couple of choice boxes, to exchange first two students
    void
    stop()
    User can stop to move students at every time, so when he clicks stop button the message is sent immediately, containing only students he has chosen until that moment
    void
    updateSwitchStudents(javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> fromEntranceBox, javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> fromCharCardBox)
    when a student is chosen, that place will have one less student for example, if I move a red student from entrance, entrance will have one less red student

  • Method Details

    • setupScene

      public <T> void setupScene(ClientModel clientModel, T parameters)
      This method prepares the form to ask character card 7 parameters Choice boxes are populated with available colors and islands This card allows user to exchange up to 3 students between entrance and character card, so at the beginning is only populated the first couple of choice boxes, to exchange first two students
      Overrides:
      setupScene in class SceneController
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic parameter
      Parameters:
      clientModel - clientModel
      parameters - a generic parameter which depends, based on specific scene

    • confirm1

      public void confirm1()
      When user confirms first 2 students to exchange The first couple of choice boxes is disabled, and second one is populated

    • confirm2

      public void confirm2()
      When user confirms second 2 students to exchange The second couple of choice boxes is disabled, and third one is populated

    • confirm3

      public void confirm3()
      When user confirms last 2 students to exchange A message is sent to server, which contains character card 7 parameters

    • stop

      public void stop()
      User can stop to move students at every time, so when he clicks stop button the message is sent immediately, containing only students he has chosen until that moment

    • setChoiceBoxEntrance

      public void setChoiceBoxEntrance(javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> choiceBox)

      Parameters:
      choiceBox - the choice box to populate

    • updateSwitchStudents

      public void updateSwitchStudents(javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> fromEntranceBox, javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> fromCharCardBox)
      when a student is chosen, that place will have one less student for example, if I move a red student from entrance, entrance will have one less red student
      Parameters:
      fromCharCardBox - the choice box of character card
      fromEntranceBox - the choice box of entrance

    • disableButtonAndChoiceBox

    • activateButton

      private void activateButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      At the beginning, button is disabled, because user must choose a couple of students When choice boxes contain a value, button is activated
      Parameters:
      event - on choice box action
